Suited to use both morning and evening, this potent ingredient offers significant benefits when paired with time and dedication.",btn_text:"Discover more about Vitamin C",link:"https://www.aesop.com/u1nb1km7t5q7/6LJ7EiE7BZdDEbq3qEeiCg/c4cacacb51624f618b718af55f2845b5/Aesop_Skin_Care_Plus_2021_Web_Homepage_Secondary_GL_1920x1080px.jpg"};export var sp2={main:"Knowledge is power",head:"Aesop on Vitamins",text:"The science behind some of the ingredients we return to time and again for their unique characteristics—be they soothing, calming, balancing, nourishing or anti-oxidant.",btn_text:"Discover Vitamins",link:"https://www.aesop.com/u1nb1km7t5q7/4vJPk6eJ2ykSvcwxttrgi9/af59ce48eb21669ef2716cab70c4d188/Aesop_Skin_Care_Plus_2021_Web_Range_Page_Secondary_Mid_GL_Tablet_1400x788px.jpg"};export var sp3={main:"Facial Appointments",head:"Composure for the skin and senses",text:"For a well-rounded skin care regimen, Aesop Facial Appointments offer a series of treatments tailored to balance, stimulate and intensely nourish the skin.",btn_text:"Learn more",link:"https://www.aesop.com/u1nb1km7t5q7/42B1XVC211ivzeEyQ3ZmjB/0cf1fc8119933c67ba6f946e7be6f2d0/Aesop-Generic-Images-Facial-Appointments-1-Mid-Tablet-1400x788px.jpg"};
